title: Memon questions hike in POL prices ahead of Ramazan
desc: Sindh’s Senior Minister Sharjeel Inam Memon expressed deep concern over the increase in petroleum product prices, stating that the rise of 5 rupees per liter in petrol and 7.32 rupees per liter in diesel just before the holy month of Ramadan will further intensify inflationary pressures. title: Man in tactical vest with loaded shotgun arrested after charging US Capitol, police say
desc: An 18-year-old in a tactical vest who charged the US Capitol with a loaded shotgun Tuesday was quickly arrested, US Capitol Police said.

title: Saudi Arabia announces start of Ramadan as Nigerian muslims await crescent moon
desc: “Crescent has been SIGHTED. Subsequently, tomorrow, i.e., Wednesday, 18 February 2026, will be the first day of Ramadan 1447,” a statement on the official Facebook page of the holy mosques read.
